title: Women's Organic Scoop Neck Tee
description: Building a sustainable wardrobe starts with essential pieces you can wear just about anywhere. Our Organic Scoop Neck Tee is designed to be the go-to t-shirt of your closet. We worked painstakingly to perfect the neckline, finishing it with a fine rib trim that helps hold its shape and added just enough gentle shaping through the body for a comfortable, timeless fit.
features: 95% organic Pima cotton 5% spandex stretch jersey; The hint of spandex adds comfortable stretch and helps retain shape; Earth-friendly, certified safe dyes; Machine wash; 25.5-inch length (size Medium); Gently shaped fit; Fairly made in Lima, Peru; Mix + Match: Save 10% when you buy 2 or more organic cotton t-shirts

title: Women's Organic Long Sleeve Crew Neck T-shirt
description: A quintessential staple in any organic wardrobe - the classic Long Sleeve Crew Neck Tee. In addition to its fair trade credentials, what sets this one apart is the fabric. A substantial blend of organic Peruvian Pima cotton (among the finest in the world) with a hint of spandex yields a beautiful drape and enduring resilience. With long lasting Pima cotton, you can rest assured your tee will look and feel great for years to come.

title: Women's Organic Relaxed Crew Neck T-shirt
